website_summaries.verdict: Designed primarily for serious hobbyists or professionals, especially in and around water. Significant price point, but the one to own for high value searches.
pros: Used by many professional treasure hunters
"Pro" mode changes pitch between junk and valuable metals
cons: Does not perform well in brackish water

customer_reviews.title: It worked way more gooder than I thought it would.
customer_reviews.text: My buddy has a metal plate in his head from being slammed on the ground by a bouncer when we got kicked out of a bar. This detector detected the metal plate in my buddy’s head about 4 months after his surgery.
customer_reviews.author: Cibmog

customer_reviews.title: NIce, works great!
customer_reviews.text: Very Nice. I consistently dig way more GOOD stuff than any other person I've hunted with. Very happy with it. I've used it primarily it turf and forest locations, but also in rivers, creeks and saltwater bays. Saltwater took a bit of getting used to, but ended up with a gold ring and more than 70 coins in a single day!
customer_reviews.author: Danno

customer_reviews.title: Helps me search for coins!
customer_reviews.text: A very light weight metal detector and it was easy to assemble. I used it to search for coins and it works great! I also enjoyed this product because it is water resistant and i have used it while it is raining, I even took it the beach and dipped the lower part in the ocean and it worked! It does the job to find a lot of trash and coins, no gold yet but hopefully soon I will hit the jackpot. This is perfect for beginners who are curious/ interested in metal detecting, it is not expensive and the screen shows how deep the object is, and what it is.
customer_reviews.author: Yery

customer_reviews.title: Great for a quality entry level machine
customer_reviews.text: Really loving my AT Pro! I've been to the beach, an abandoned TB ward, and a hiking trial. I've only found pennies, but it works as expected. Great for a quality entry level machine. Probably the best "all terrain" machine for this price. It struggles a little with the beach, but with proper tuning/balancing it works well enough.
customer_reviews.author: Victory

customer_reviews.title: Misadvertisement
customer_reviews.text: The metal detector is exactly as it should be, however, when I placed my order there was more than the metal detector pictured. The image had a pinpointer and a little case of some sort. After my order was placed the image changed to only a metal detector. People in the comments said you get whatever was in the photo. This is a misadvertisement and I am upset and feel that I have been tricked by the photo switch. I should have received what was pictured in the photo when I placed my order. I will not fo business with this seller again.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Best metal detector for the money
customer_reviews.text: The At Pro is, in my opinion, the best detector one can buy for the money. The reason being is that there are two settings, standard and proportionate, labeled std and pro. The std setting is great to learn on for beginners, and one can graduate to the pro setting once one learns the machine. The pro setting gives you more of a range when it comes to depth, you can tell if an object is deep or at the surface. One can easily grow with this machine. Are there better metal detectors out there? Yes. Are there any detectors better for $550? I don't know of any.
customer_reviews.author: Marty S

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the novice like me!
customer_reviews.text: Never had a Metal Detector before. This thing is a blast! I bought this to help find a gold wedding ring I think I lost in our yard. I have not found the ring yet, but I have found a bunch of other things. This is the perfect detector for the beginner like me. It is very easy to use. Pray that I find my wedding ring. If I do this detector will have paid for itself!
customer_reviews.author: R. Pruitt

customer_reviews.title: Not a novice/beginner device
customer_reviews.text: Great metal detector but not entry level at all. Very complicated setup and difficult to use for a novice/beginner. While many sites claim it is a good setup for a novice, I feel it is overly complicated to start with.
customer_reviews.author: KM

customer_reviews.title: was hoping for more
customer_reviews.text: all the hype on the AT Pro. for 1 you cant adjust the volume so its just loud unless you use the headphones which is not always a good thing when you need to pay attention to your surroundings. 2 it beeps incessently and is no better than my $200 cheapie detector. Yes theres fancy ways to eliminate some tones but it is not easy by far. sorry but I wish I could return this.
customer_reviews.author: Andra

customer_reviews.title: Are you kidding?
customer_reviews.text: Are you kidding? The AT Pro is awesome. As was my transaction with you. Very happy. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Michael C Barron

customer_reviews.title: Great machine
customer_reviews.text: Great metal detector. Very pleased with it since purchasing a month ago. I have found countless musket balls, a few pieces of silver, and even a King George II colonial copper that my whites treasure pro missed. I have no complaints as of yet. The pinpointer button acted a little fishy one day and didn’t want to make noise but it’s only happened once. I would highly suggest this machine to any beginner or medium level detectorist.
customer_reviews.author: CUHort

customer_reviews.title: Garrett so much fun!
customer_reviews.text: Product has exceeded expectations. My husband loves it. He said it is lightweight and easy to use. He goes to beach just about everyday he is having so much fun. Thanks Garrett!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara S.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: First of all, I love Garrett products! I bought this for my wife to use when we go detecting. This is an absolute great machine! Very accurate, very easy to use and learn! I would definitely recommend this machine!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing for everything!
customer_reviews.text: Sooo happy with mine, best mid range detecting for the price. Just amazing, makes metal detecting fun again! Was able to pull hundreds of dollars of coins and discriminate all the junk!
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin Fuller

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: As someone fairly new to metal detecting, I've loved this model! It's easy to learn but it is fairly advanced and capable of doing more than I am at this point. I love the pinpointing feature and the ability to see and "hear" what's in the ground. This is one of the best values in metal detectors!
customer_reviews.author: Matthew K.

customer_reviews.title: METAL!! \m/ \m/
customer_reviews.text: Great detector. Haven’t used it much as it’s just too hot outside right now to enjoy but works great so far. Def suggest getting a pinpointer for accuracy when digging.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Detector
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use detector with clear instruction guide. Makes it a joy to use.
customer_reviews.author: J. Adams

customer_reviews.title: I bought a smaller coil that works fine.
customer_reviews.text: Mine has issue with coil. Garret sent me a new coil but it didnt fix the problem. I bought a smaller coil that works fine.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff C

customer_reviews.title: I just couldn't get used to it so I sent it back and got this awesome Garrett AT Pro
customer_reviews.text: Okay boys and girls... I had ordered the Whites TreasurePro before I ordered this machine. The whites was all over the place with iffy signals. I just couldn't get used to it so I sent it back and got this awesome Garrett AT Pro. Huge difference in my coin and relic discovery. I absolutely love the pro mode for "hearing" what targets lay in the ground. I can hear the difference between a bottle cap and a quarter and just how deep a target is by how loud the signal is. Wish I would have gotten this out of the gate but I dont care as long as I have it!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: as good as everyone says it is. great starter pack!
customer_reviews.author: David W. Sutter

customer_reviews.title: We really like it. The many online tutorials and the included ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this unit for my wife. We really like it. The many online tutorials and the included guide have been very helpful. Hard to use where the waves wash up on the beach. Works great on the sand. Have not used it yet on regular dirt. Wife's first target was a coin!
customer_reviews.author: Del Mack

customer_reviews.title: Great machine
customer_reviews.text: Very happy! Found my tungsten ring that I lost amongst many other things! Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Adam D Carr

customer_reviews.title: The best of the best
customer_reviews.text: Garrett is the best metal detector on the market in my opinion. I found three and this has been the best so far. Great product always recommend it
customer_reviews.author: Kirk s

customer_reviews.title: It is easy to use and the learning cure is very short
customer_reviews.text: I use Tesoro most of the time but like the shallow water operation of this machine. It is easy to use and the learning curve is very short.
customer_reviews.author: michael d callahan

customer_reviews.title: Well made and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my husband. He loves it. It has a lot of features, is very well made, but still easy to use. Recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: yeah this detector is awesome!! Well worth the price in my opinion
customer_reviews.text: Um, yeah this detector is awesome!! Well worth the price in my opinion. Once I got used to how it works and sounds I can detect trash and treasure immediately. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: great game

customer_reviews.title: love this product
customer_reviews.text: love this product, had many hours of fun with it this past summer, and the video's that Garrett has on line are a big plus.
customer_reviews.author: Raymond DiFazio

customer_reviews.title: GOOD DETECTOR
customer_reviews.text: HAD TO SEND FOR SERVICE BEFORE FIRST USE HEAD SET DIDNT WORK
customer_reviews.author: james peeler

customer_reviews.title: Good for First Metal Detector
customer_reviews.text: A lot of features and taken a little bit to get use to the many features. Was great for looking a couple of metal valves covered up in my yard so I can make repairs to irrigation system.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Black

customer_reviews.title: YouTube videos will reassure this is a great product!
customer_reviews.text: Research paid off . I’m new to hobby and with booklet and google YouTube videos learning is easy. Do yourself a favor and watch Garret AT Pro videos and you’ll b reassured you have a Great Product!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Got in as promised. Was using within 15 minutes found first thing in 5 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: John Kutz

customer_reviews.title: Great detector
customer_reviews.text: The detector is great. I've found coins of various types and old glass medicine bottles. (The corroded metal caps were still there). Other finds were broken fur traps, lots of shell casings, harness buckles etc. Beware the foil from drink boxes!
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't ask for a better unit. I'm just a beginner and having a easy time using it.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Great detector BUT headphones suck....
customer_reviews.text: Great detector BUT the headphones stopped working less than two weeks after I received the detector.
customer_reviews.author: James M. Reagan

customer_reviews.title: Vast improved proformance over ACE 250
customer_reviews.text: Finds targets that my Garrett ACE 250 missed. Only problem so far is that the pinpointing feature ceased to work and machine started to act erratically. Had to use the reset feature on the power button to correct the problems. Hope it does not reoccur.
customer_reviews.author: Arthur

customer_reviews.title: Great machine, head phones didn't work.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love the Garrett at pro! Got it for my birthday, the machine seems to work great, but like a lot of reviews I saw the head phones did NOT work right out of the box, kind of dissapointed that Garrett would make a great machine but very poor head phones.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: very good metal detector
customer_reviews.text: Kind of complicated with so many options , very good metal detector
customer_reviews.author: JOlds

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The product exceeded my expectations. The dealer was very prompt.
customer_reviews.author: rockman

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great metal detector lots of fun would recommend to anyone fast shipping thank you
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Detector
customer_reviews.text: works great still learning how to use but is a great detector !
customer_reviews.author: freddy1500

customer_reviews.title: Had it for awhile now and It still works great! Must have for people who really want to ...
customer_reviews.text: Had it for awhile now and It still works great! Must have for people who really want to get into this type of activity!
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it so far. Still learning the ins & outs but finding treasure already
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Barber

customer_reviews.title: Lots of buttons and vague instructions but still fun hunting
customer_reviews.text: Still figuring it out. Working on learning it. Haven't had much time with it yet but works great
customer_reviews.author: Wayno

customer_reviews.title: Great first detector.
customer_reviews.text: Works good so far. I would suggest looking up a target chart online so you have some idea as to what certain relics/coins will read on the machine.
customer_reviews.author: Quintarious

customer_reviews.title: Surpasses expectations.
customer_reviews.text: EXCEPTIONAL QUALITY. GREAT FEATURES AND ACCURACY. A MUST TO HAVE.
customer_reviews.author: JOHN S

customer_reviews.title: Significant improvement over my old detector.
customer_reviews.text: I spend less time digging and find more valuables. It is a quality piece of equipment.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Milner

customer_reviews.title: Great Mahcine. Headphones Died After Less Than A Month.
customer_reviews.text: Less than a month after purchasing, the included headphones no longer work. I'm an experienced detectorist and am very familiar with Garrett's products. After less than ten times out in the field using the detector. I store my detector in a waterproof container when not in use. I've tried cleaning the connections, replacing the batteries, and multiple full system resets to no avail. Rather disappointed about this issue, as my ACE 400 headphones, which are much more cheaply made, are still in working condition after over 2 years of heavy use.
customer_reviews.author: AFE

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome detector for beginners or pros very easy to use
customer_reviews.author: Cory hill

customer_reviews.title: Over priced
customer_reviews.text: Over priced. Similar units with the same capabilities for a third of the cost
customer_reviews.author: Mark Kowalczyk1

customer_reviews.title: I APPROVE
customer_reviews.text: This was my first metal detector and I have put this all terrain to the test! It's still going and I'm still finding treasures! I'm so glad I chose the Garrett AT Pro for my first detector. I have learned so much about the hobby and I still feel like this machine is enough for me to continue to be a successful treasure hunter!
customer_reviews.author: Tracy

customer_reviews.title: New Garrett A T PRO
customer_reviews.text: I received the AT PRO it came on time as expected, I assembled it right out of the box no problems with assembly it works great. I took it to beach the very next day to get used to all settings it worked great! Found 51 cents right off
customer_reviews.author: Phil

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I believe that this is the greatest Metal Detector on the planet, I just love it.
customer_reviews.author: GT

customer_reviews.title: Best Detector I've Ever Owned
customer_reviews.text: I moved up to this detector from the bounty hunter quick draw pro and its amazing. its well made, has a great coil, and is water proof so you don't have to work about dropping it in water. I would buy it again and again
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: Great for land not a good saltwater Detector
customer_reviews.text: I love it it's a great Machine works good on land and dry sand it works in salt water but you have to tune it way down and it's still chatty and thus lose's depth I'm gonna buy a saltwater Machine for the wet sand and surf and use this everywhere else this thing is great in freshwater so it works out
customer_reviews.author: Ronald D.

customer_reviews.title: Quality product.
customer_reviews.text: There is a large Garrett AT Pro community out there. Join them on Facebook and enjoy!
customer_reviews.author: Mister Freeze

customer_reviews.title: Great detector - Needs a backlight
customer_reviews.text: I really like this metal detector. Full disclosure, I returned mine because it was shipped too slow (paid for 1-day shipping and didn't get it until 5 days later). I purchased another one from another retailer. This detector is great! I really enjoy the fact that it is waterproof. The detector is also one of the most accurate for its price range. My only complaint is that the screen does not have a back-light. This is a huge oversight, as I enjoy detecting in the evening after I get home from work (in the dark).
customer_reviews.author: izzy

customer_reviews.title: The pin pointing function is really great and I do a lot less digging now
customer_reviews.text: A lot more bells and whistles than my Ace 150. Only been out with it three times (too hot out) so still leaning how to use it and to pin point items. The pin pointing function is really great and I do a lot less digging now. If you do buy this detector know one thing it is a pull tab magnet. I am sure as I get more experience hopefully I will be digging less pull tabs.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Haven't found any buried treasure but have found lots of things. Works great
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Stalcup

customer_reviews.title: AT PRO
customer_reviews.text: I have been a Garrett man for a great many years and this is one of the top of the line.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No regrets with this metal detector
customer_reviews.text: I have various and assorted detectors, but this one is my favorite. The AT Pro has it all. No regrets buying this metal detector.
customer_reviews.author: Max Bennett

customer_reviews.title: Great equipment and customer service
customer_reviews.text: I love my new metal detector. I would order from this company again.
customer_reviews.author: JOHN CALDWELL

customer_reviews.title: Works good my husband loves it I didn't give a five ...
customer_reviews.text: Works good my husband loves it I didn't give a five cause I'm not quite for sure if it does the metals finding good
customer_reviews.author: kristine

customer_reviews.title: Since I'm a novice, trying to get it to ...
customer_reviews.text: Since I'm a novice, trying to get it to work around salt water is tricky. The sensitivity is still a challenge.
customer_reviews.author: Wanda Davidson

customer_reviews.title: Bought it to exclusively hunt in water and so far ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought it to exclusively hunt in water and so far it has been really unstable in brackish water but works well in fresh water.
customer_reviews.author: J. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Excitement wore off
customer_reviews.text: I'm still a beginner with this, have trouble distinguishing what I can skip. I expected more precision for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Marls

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great m/d to use, lots of finds lots of fun
customer_reviews.author: anthony

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: A little disappointed that it doesn't have a rechargeable battery pack, but is a good product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality control
customer_reviews.text: The detector was defective and had to send back for the detector to be defective right out of the box is not a good thing for the price that they get for it
customer_reviews.author: Roger Estes

customer_reviews.title: Wahoo
customer_reviews.text: The best detector I've ever used. Easy to function. You know where your target is. Features are amazing allowing you to detect using the discrimination mode and ground balancing. I could go on and on but believe me this is a great buy
customer_reviews.author: Rutrow

product_meta.title: Garrett AT Pro Metal Detector
product_meta.description: Includes the NEW Garrett MS-2 Headphones and Factory 2 Year Warranty. Batteries included and installed.
feature_bullets: WATERPROOF TO 10 FEET OR 3 METERS Ideal for use in both fresh and saltwater AT Pro will ground balance to saltwater.
As seen on the TV Show Diggers

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars281 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
